biotools.summary: Linear-time program for inferring haplotypes from genotypes to determine if there are resulting haplotypes that fit a tree model.In more population genetic terms, LPPH determines whether a set of SNP genotypes can be explained by haplotype pairs that could have evolved on a coalescent under the no-recombination, infinite sites model. Hence it determines for SNP genotype data what the three or four gametes test (depending on whether the tree is rooted or not) determines for haplotype data.

bioschemas.name: LPPH

Hence it determines for SNP genotype data what the three or four gametes test (depending on whether the tree is rooted or not) determines for haplotype data.
